name: Trigo Forrest
description:
A side scrolling platformer game in which you guide an ever hungry rabbit to more food. Talk to the Piggy and Squirrel to learn Trigonometry! The Piggy doesn't understand maths, just mugs up jargon and recites it. The squirrels though understand it.

This is part of an initiative to build educational video games focused on learning STEM topics (maths, physics) for age group 10 years and beyond. Play, reflect on it and learn. Many more games about Calculus, Vectors, Co-ordinate geometry, Area models, Newton's laws are coming soon.

Add any questions you may have in comments!

Controls

  • Move using left / right arrow buttons
  • Climb up / down arrow buttons
  • Jump using X button
  • Press Esc to save/resume

Credits

  • Pixel art by Ansimuz (Sunnyland)
  • Audio files by Kenney.nl
  • Piggy character from Berrie's Adventure by crusenho.itch.io
